== Requires ==
  * Python 2.6+
  * Linux 2.6.x

----

== Package Namespace ==
  * linux_metrics
    * / cpu_stat
    * / disk_stat
    * / mem_stat
    * / net_stat


----

== Modules/Functions ==
  * cpu_stat
    * cpu_times()
    * cpu_percents(sample_duration=1)
    * procs_running()
    * procs_blocked()
    * load_avg()
    * cpu_info()
  * disk_stat
    * disk_busy(device, sample_duration=1)
    * disk_reads_writes(device)
    * disk_reads_writes_persec(device, sample_duration=1)
  * mem_stat
    * mem_stats()
  * net_stat
    * rx_tx_bytes()
    * rx_tx_bits()

----
      
== Simple Example ==
{{{    
#!/usr/bin/env python
from linux_metrics import cpu_stat

print cpu_stat.procs_running()
print cpu_stat.cpu_info()
}}}
